quest.name: Dream a Little Dream
journal:
 Quest Sync
Dreamingway has one last demonstration for you.

Still determined to discover a dream worthy of pursuit, Dreamingway wishes to show you how the Loporrits grow carrots─by having you try it yourself. To begin, he asks that you bring a handful of seeds to the carrot creation station nearby.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

You somewhat unceremoniously load the seeds into the carrot creation station, impressing Dreamingway nevertheless. He explains that the next step towards a bountiful harvest requires water crystals, which can be had from the sparkling supply station in the northeast corner of the Carrotorium.

You find a large store of crystals exactly where Dreamingway said they would be. With crate in hand, you make your perilous journey over ramp and oversized stairway to arrive at a nearby carrot creation station.

Once the crystals are deposited into the machine, all one needs do is wait for the carrots to grow. Fortuitously, after mere moments, Dreamingway hears a sound─undetectable to your ears─that indicates carrots elsewhere in the Carrotorium are ready for picking.

You visit the surrounding creation stations and, surely enough, find two carrots practically begging to be plucked. After freeing them with satisfying tugs, you tuck them into your bag that you might present them to Dreamingway.

Dreamingway commends you on a job well done, though sadly, your success only reaffirms his belief that he is an unremarkable Loporrit. Mention of his exceptional hearing, however, gives you an idea, and so you ask if he has ever considered musical pursuits. After a brief explanation of what music is, he hums a melody together with his companion Knockingway. Both find it to be a heartwarming experience, and thus is Dreamingway inspired to share the gift of music with anyone and everyone─a dream of his very own.

Knockingway thanks you for solving Dreamingway's problem as only a person of Etheirys can. Similarly, the newly motivated Loporrit promises to practice his music often, hopeful that he will have a new tune to play for you when next you meet.
objectives: Place carrot seeds in the carrot creation station.
Pick up the crate of crystals.
Fill the carrot creation station with water crystals.
Obtain carrots from the carrot creation stations.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well, Forename? Are you excited to learn about the wonderful world of carrot cultivation?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Not that there's a lot to it, truth be told. We simply place the seeds in the machine, water them, and then reap the sweet rewards.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: It's so easy that a─well, that anyone could do it!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hmm... As far as I know, you're an “anyone.” Why not try it for yourself?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, completing menial tasks is so much more fun with friends! Pray take these seeds and follow me─I do believe there's an open creation station nearby.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Go on, place the seeds in here.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: That carefree tossing motion of yours seems to have scattered the seeds nicely. Now, of course, they'll need water...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Water crystals, to be precise─and this isn't the only machine in need of replenishment. Why don't you pay a visit to the sparkling supply station over in the northeast corner, and then bring a crate of crystals to the creation station nearby?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Those crystals won't carry themselves from the supply station! It's in the northeast corner─you can't miss it.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Load those crystals into the machine to start the growing process─preferably before you drop them all over the floor.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Take the bucket of crystals to the carrot creation station to the southwest before your arms give out.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have ninety seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: That should be enough to make our carrots grow nice and big! And the machine converts them into water bit by bit, so we never need worry that the seedlings are too wet or too dry.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Oho! Don't you just love that sound?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: What─did you not hear that tone just now? It's telling us there are carrots ready for harvesting!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: They're not at this station, but I am certain I heard the joyous sound of two ripened carrots. You may as well see this through to the end─pulling them is the best part!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: That's two fully ripened carrots, remember? I'll wait for you by the entrance.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Do I smell carrots? ...That was rhetorical. It definitely smells like carrots in here.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Mmm, mouthwatering!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: That's really all there is to it─and to my days, to put it plainly. I apologize for not being more interesting to follow around.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: So...have you any ideas for a dream that would suit a Loporrit like me?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Er...maybe we should consider one of your hobbies.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What do you do when you're not working?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: But I...I don't have any hobbies...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I, um... What do I do?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: <sigh> It seems it just wasn't meant to be. I should never have taken such an extraordinary name, being so very ordinary myself...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: If only I had some sort of skill to set me apart from the others! Aside from hearing things no one else does, I suppose.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Hmm... Do you like listening to music?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: A good ear, eh? Have you tried making music?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I've read of this “music” of yours, though I'm afraid I don't understand why you all enjoy it so much...or why you must write it down in such cryptic ways.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh! I've read about this “music” of yours, though I'm afraid I can't make heads nor tails of the notation. Do you really think I could learn how to create something so inscrutable?

dialogue.name: KNOCKINGWAY
dialogue.text: What are you two up to?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename was just suggesting that I put the “dream” in “Dreamingway” through the pursuit of music!

dialogue.name: KNOCKINGWAY
dialogue.text: “Music”? I can't say I'm familiar.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Yes, we Loporrits can do something similar! A whole lung...nose...face...thing...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Look, let's just try it and see how it sounds. Come on, Knockingway!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: One, two, three!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Goodness, that's terribly fun!

dialogue.name: KNOCKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I must confess, humming in tandem has a certain charm that snorting or shrieking does not. I'd be interested in more such “music,” I daresay!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Then that will be my dream─bringing joy to others through music!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Who knows...perhaps I can inspire others to pursue their own dreams, too.

dialogue.name: THINKINGWAY
dialogue.text: What were those noises? What's this all about?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Why, the gift of music, of course! Like this...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I...I think that might be enough musicking for one day...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I don't know how I'll ever thank you, Forename. You've changed my life!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Finally, I can hold my head high, knowing that my heart will guide my way forward.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Dreamingway has a dream!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: At long last, I'm living my dream! I hope that someday I can repay your kindness.

dialogue.name: KNOCKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I cannot thank you enough for helping my dear friend.

dialogue.name: KNOCKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I hadn't realized he was so upset over not having a dream, of all things...

dialogue.name: KNOCKINGWAY
dialogue.text: You helped him as only a person of Etheirys could.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I still have my other tasks to attend to, of course, but I promise to practice every day.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Eventually, I want to go beyond just humming, and compose original music!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: When next we meet, I hope you'll once again lend me an ear. Maybe even two!
